Hey, the program in general runs great, but i keep having issues when i try to use the business catalyst... whenever i try to use it, the whole program crashes and closes on me. Any tips or ideas on how i can fix this? or what might be wrong with it?

Found Bug with the Business Catalyst feature... only works the first time you install DW CS6, once you logout of the catalyst or restart your computer, catalyst stops working, and crashes the whole DW program, any ideas on how to fix this?

I have personally found that the only way around this is to re-install the program, but that's only a temporary fix for being able to use it again after you restart windows. 

A more permanent solution would be greatly appreciated. Thanks

Hey guys. When I try to install the Trial version, once I have chosen my language and click accept, it asks me to enter my Adobe ID to start my trial. It wants me to sign in.. Any help would be very much appreciated.. Thanks.
